resources.string: you can block any number for Message and Call (No-Limit) .
Sms Blocker: You can also fetch number/name from the contact List to add to Block List.
Sms Blocker: You can also save the Blocked Messages List into text file in your Mobile.
Special Service: You can also Block special Number/Advertising Numbers for eg. (LM-XXXX).
Call Blocker: All Calls from the Disturbing Number shall be Blocked.
Back-Up: you can also keep the Backup in your pc also.
SMS: You can also send the Messages from This Application directly.
Terms And Condition : 1) No Charges are taken for Sms And Call Block facility.
2) Message sending will be charged as per your message Plan. No Extra Charge.
